content: weird... the 'current' URL is http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-ehrx/ but the ballot URL is http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-hrex/2019Jun/. so is it ehrx or hrex? whatever. it's out there have at'er

hrex is the official name. ehrx was the original proposed name (and where the work started). Same thing happened with cdex and pdex (which used to be ecdx and epdx). "rx" and "dx" were deemed too confusing for use.

Yes, the github repositories were created when we were still using the old names, and the CI build uses the repo name in the URL. We discussed renaming the repos, but choose to postpone that decision until after the ballot was out so that folks could keep working without interruption. Didn't want to rock the boat.

@Lynn Laakso Looks like HRex is out there now. Per my email last night, I need to update CDex and PDex to refer to the 0.1.0 version instead of current once HRex is ready. I am assuming that is the case now, but if you are still working on it let me know.
